channel.title: Revenge Pk l 24/7 l Needing Staff
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://revenge-pk.com/images/logo.png[/img]
Website [url=http://revengepk.web44.net/RevengePk/]http://revengepk.web44.net/RevengePk/[/url] (Don't always work because of the poor free hosting.) Webclient [url=http://revengepk.web44.net/RevengePk/play.php]http://revengepk.web44.net/RevengePk/play.php[/url] (Don't always work because of the poor free hosting.) Download (Soon to come)[/CENTER]
[size=18pt]Features![/size]
- 24/7 NO LAG
- 24/7 VPS HOSTED
- Webclient
- Vote4cash with GENEROUS reward. (15 RPKP, 10 Vote Points, & 10M)
- Nex
- Custom Minigames
- Nomad
- Working Handcannon
- Custom Donorzone (Not that crappy normal one.)
- Dungeoneering
- Construction
- Frost Dragons
- Skeletal Horrors
- NO DUPES
- WORKING REVENANTS
- Kalphite Queens
[CENTER][size=14pt]Media[/size][/CENTER]

item.title: Revenge Pk l 24/7 l Needing Staff
item.dc:creator: @coolcsl10 coolcsl10
item.description:
@coolcsl10 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:5, topic:450410”][quote author=coolcsl10 link=topic=553293.msg4053886#msg4053886 date=1342756031]

Another server with NO original programming or features. It looks like all you did was move N.P.C. spawns and objects. Everything else is tutorials or was already done.

Protip: Screenshots of your Shops won’t make your server stand out. You also might want to delete that screenshot of your Dagganoth N.P.C. glitching.

Never said that it was my server
[/quote]

I assumed that because you posted it, It’s probably your work. I can see why the owner doesn’t want to take responsibility for it, lol.[/quote]
lol thats a little harsh, I was just trying to get some more people to join the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Revenge Pk l 24/7 l Needing Staff
